result.eng: Would you prefer a cup of tea?
result.html: Arbh fhearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?
result.ponchtml: Arḃ ḟearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: Which would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ga: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.orig: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.html: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ab ḟearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?

result.eng: Wouldn't you rather go somewhere else?
result.ga: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eile
result.orig: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eile
result.html: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eileWouldn't you rather go somewhere else?
result.ponchtml: Nárḃ ḟearr leat dul áit éigin eileWouldn't you rather go somewhere else?

result.eng: What day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ga: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.orig: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.html: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ponchtml: Cén lá den tseaċtain ab ḟearr liḃ taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?
